location.comm: The hotel is conveniently located near Disney and offers easy access to various dining options.

cont.itemB: The location is excellent, took about 10 mins to get to Disney and about 20 mins to Universal and SeaWorld.

cleanliness.comm: The rooms are generally clean, although there are mentions of maintenance issues.

cont.itemB: The room was clean and was cleaned every day, towels and bed sheets changed, we came back to a spotless room.

service.comm: The staff are friendly and accommodating, though experiences vary.

cont.itemA: We were traveling with two small children and they were very accommodating.
cont.itemB: In fairness, the staff are very friendly and all issues raised were dealt with.

price.comm: Prices at the hotel are perceived as expensive, though some guests feel they are worthwhile.

cont.itemA: Thought the prices were quite expensive, plus it's $13 to park...ugh!
cont.itemB: My honest advice, not even worth the small amount paid, I will never stay here again.

itemA.room: Our 1-bedroom suite was spectacular, with a large bedroom and living room, but beds were small.
itemA.dining: Both restaurants where we dined were very good - cannot say enough great things about Old Hickory.

itemB.condition: The hotel had filthy carpets, bugs in the refrigerator, and general maintenance issues.
itemB.amenities: Air conditioning and TV worked well, and there was always a parking space despite busyness over spring break.
